data.name: Step1
data.value: Click on the "Download Android App (.apk)" link.

data.name: Step2
data.value: Confirm the download if prompted by your browser.

data.name: Step3
data.value: Once the download is complete, open the .apk file.

data.name: Step4
data.value: If a warning appears, allow installation from unknown sources in settings.

data.name: Step5
data.value: Tap "Install" to proceed with the installation.

data.name: Step6
data.value: After installation is complete, open the app.
